forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 50. Southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As evening unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, there's a tranquil clarity to the air, juxtaposed with the playful remnants of the marine layer that has danced its way across the Bay. The fog, a familiar companion to this city, appears to hold court at bay, trailing along in wisps that hover near the shoreline while the higher peaks bathe in the sun’s fading embrace. The skies are mostly clear, revealing patches of cobalt blue reticent to surrender to the night’s chill, anticipate a low around fifty. A gentle breeze whispers through the streets, an invitation to linger just a little longer before the coolness envelops the land.

Looking ahead to tomorrow, a sun-drenched day is promised, with temperatures climbing to a harmonious 69 before shifting to a soft 66 in the afternoon. The approach of dawn will reveal a landscape filled with fresh vibrance, urging the early riser to lace up comfortable shoes and set out for a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the salty kiss of the sea mingles with the hint of morning sunshine. Layering is the strategy of the day—perhaps a light sweater over your favorite t-shirt will suffice, ensuring comfort in the transitioning temperatures. For those in search of a moment's respite from life’s hustle, a visit to a local café to savor a warm drink while the day unfolds may prove to be just the ticket.
